info.title: Unlock Wealth Resort API
info.description: API documentation for Unlock Wealth Resort

post.summary: Register a new user and return tokens
post.description: Register user and receive an access token and a refresh token.

note.example: The refresh token is stored in an httpOnly cookie named 'refreshToken'.

post.description: Authenticate a user and receive an access token and a refresh token.

note.example: The refresh token is stored in an httpOnly cookie named 'refreshToken'.

post.description: Uses a refresh token stored in an httpOnly cookie to generate a new access token.

parameters.name: refreshToken
parameters.description: Refresh token cookie

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired refresh token

post.description: Logs out the current authenticated user by invalidating their token.

post.summary: Send OTP to user's email for password reset
post.description: This endpoint sends a one-time password (OTP) to the user's registered email to verify their identity before allowing a password reset.

message.example: An OTP has been sent to your email address.
We can't find a user with that email address.

post.summary: Send OTP again to user's email for password reset
post.description: This endpoint sends ahain a one-time password (OTP) to the user's registered email to verify their identity before allowing a password reset.

message.example: An OTP has been sent to your email address.
We can't find a user with that email address.

post.summary: Verify OTP before allowing password reset
post.description: This endpoint verifies the OTP sent to the user's email or phone. If the OTP is valid and not expired, the system will allow the user to proceed to the password reset step.

message.example: OTP verified. You can now reset your password.
The OTP is invalid or has expired.

post.summary: Reset password after successful OTP verification
post.description: This endpoint allows the user to reset their password after the OTP has been successfully verified. The temporary token obtained from OTP verification should be included in this request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user

get.description: Returns a paginated list of history appointments.

post.description: Create a new user's testimonial for a specific user ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user the testimonial is being created FOR (or BY, depending on your logic)
